All instructions to GitHub Copilot to create the solution


* Continue with #new workspace setup
* yes, do the rest of the instructions
* create launch.json files for visual studio code
* rename name of launch configuration to "Platform Monitor Web"
* add build step in tasks for "Platform Monitor Web"
* add settings file for vccode to not show generated files
* create a page to show the status of multiple services. Each service should show the version and with a green box if the service is up and red box if the service is down
* add service page to the main menu
